I am junior at the University of North Texas studying Information Technology with a focus in cybersecurity. Throughout my education I have found a huge interest in penestration testing and network security. I am always looking to expand my network and learn from other professionals.

Experience

Supplemental Instructor

University of North Texas

As a Supplemental Instructor (SI), I facilitated collaborative learning sessions to help students grasp complex statistical concepts and improve their problem-solving skills. I designed interactive activities, guided discussions, and provided tailored support to enhance student understanding and academic performance. Through this role, I strengthened my ability to break down technical concepts, adapt to different learning styles, and foster a supportive learning environment.

January 2023 - Present

Camp Counselor

Lifetime Fitness

As a camp counselor, I led and supervised groups of campers, ensuring a fun, safe, and engaging environment through structured activities and team-building exercises. I developed strong leadership and problem-solving skills by managing group dynamics, resolving conflicts, and adapting to unexpected challenges. My role required patience, communication, and creativity to foster a positive experience that encouraged personal growth and teamwork among campers.

Interests

Apart from being a technology enthusiast, I enjoy most of my time being with my family and friends. I am a huge sports fan and enjoy playing and watching basketball. I also enjoy reading and learning new things about the world around me. The type of literature I'm particually interested in is self improvement books.

I am deeply drawn to the world of technology because of its ability to simplify our lives, create new opportunities, and drive innovation. From cybersecurity to automation, I am fascinated by how technology enhances efficiency and connects people in ways never before possible. As a continuous learner who enjoys meeting new people, I thrive on expanding my knowledge, exchanging ideas, and staying ahead in an ever-evolving digital landscape.
